entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
